#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>

using namespace std;

long long K,N,a[1000];;
int main ()
{
scanf ("%lld %lld",&N,&K);
for (long long i=1;i<=N;i++)
scanf ("%lld",&a[i]);
for (long long x=1;x<=N-1;x++){
for (long long y=x+1;y<=N;y++){
if (a[x]+a[y]==K)  { printf ("Yes"); return 0; }
}
}
printf ("No");

return 0;
}
